summary:
Gives Orcish Weapons the base damage of their Daedric counterparts *as per request by De Looney [comments] - http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=5206* 
Note: Intended for end-game use.
descriptionHtml:
Gives Orcish Weapons the base damage of their Daedric counterparts *as per request by De Looney [comments] - http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=5206* 
Note: Intended for end-game use.
Details
======
Base damage of Orcish Weapons are as follows;

- Orcish Dagger; 11
- Orcish Bow; 19
- Orcish Sword; 14
- Orcish War Axe; 15
- Orcish Mace; 16
- Orcish Greatsword; 24
- Orcish Battleaxe; 25
- Orcish Warhammer; 27

Install
=====
Automatic:Use Nexus Mod Manager(NMM)

Manual: Extract the contents of archive to skyrim/Data folder. Open Skyrim Launcher and then Data files. Make sure the checkbox next to \"Daedric-Quality Orcish Weapons\" is checked.

Uninstall
========
Automatic: Deactivate using NMM

Manual: Uncheck the checkbox next to \"Daedric-Quality Orcish Weapons\" and delete the Daedric-Quality Orcish Weapons.esp file from your skyrim/Data folder.

Incompatibilty
============
Any other mod that alters the base damage of Orcish weapons.

Credits
======
Thanks to DaveHumphries for his wonderful tool, SkyEdit
author: Claw3000
